summary: This is a docket entry from the Second Circuit Court of Appeals regarding the case United States v. Maxwell. It records the court's order denying Ghislaine Maxwell's motion for bail, filed while her appeal was pending.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: The defendant in the criminal case who filed a motion for bail that was denied by the court.

events.title: Bail Motion Denied
events.description: The United States Court of Appeals for the Second Circuit issued an order denying Ghislaine Maxwell's motion for bail.

keyFacts: The document is a court docket entry from the Second Circuit Court of Appeals for case numbers 21-58 and 21-770.
It records the denial of a motion for bail filed by the appellant, Ghislaine Maxwell.
The order was filed on April 27, 2021, by a panel of judges (PNL, RJL, RJS).
